title: "Web Scrapping"
author: "Myeong Lee"
date: "4/13/2022"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library("selectr")
library("xml2")
library("rvest")

url <- "https://nytimes.com"
webpage <- read_html(url)

# Use CSS selectors to retrieve data that you want
titles <- html_nodes(webpage, "div h2")
without_tags <- gsub("<.*?>", "", titles)  

```
